display_long_description:
Get a taste of the multiplayer experience in VEX MAGE!  Twin elements. Infinite momentum. Danger from every direction. Merge spells, cross dimensions, and dance through deadly arenas in this lightning-fast shooter.

# **Vexatious Combat:** 
Enemies strike from all sides - survive by mastering your movement and aggression.
[media]

# **Co-op Multiplayer:** 
Fight alone or with up to two allies. The challenge adapts, so every run is a test of survival.
[media]

# **Combine The Elements:** 
Assign elemental runes to each hand and fuse them for devastating results.
[media]

# **Global Leaderboards:** 
Leave your mark and fight your way up the global ranks, where only the deadliest rise to the top.
[media]

# The full game will include:
**A Rapid-Fire Campaign:** Levels that explode with speed, chaos, and pure adrenaline.
[media]
